attributes.action: help the Ipswich Dock Railway Preservation Society to obtain a railway in Ipswich, help preserve it and stop EWS from ripping it up into a roadway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ipswich Dock Railway Preservation Society wants to buy a railway off Network rail and help preserve it buy operating steam locomotives, but the route which we hope to buy is under threat of being ripped up and being replaced by a road which will connect to the upper yard in Ipswich to Ranelagh Road on the track bed. They will distroy a GER signal box and a set of LNER level crossing gates which have become a land mark in Ipswich. We can only prevent this distruction to occur with your help. Help prevent EWS from doing this and bring an old railway back to life.
